title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 89.0 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 89.0 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to apply audit and reporting standards upon insurers, fraternal benefit societies and managed care organizations. These standards are modeled on the standards required by the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
89.0

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
